entry.tran: 社会主义式的;具有社会主义某些特征的;有社会主义色彩的
entry.def: If you describe a policy or organization as socialistic, you mean that it has some of the features of socialism.

example.ex: ...a design to move our economy in a socialistic direction.
example.tran: 使我们的经济走上社会主义道路的计划

example.ex: Most of these specific Socialistic policies have been abandoned.
example.tran: 这些具有社会主义色彩的具体政策大部分都被废止了。

means.word_mean: 1. advocating or following the socialist principles;
2. of or relating to or promoting or practicing socialism;
